nodes.text: Pol Prentiss was the brother of Cassio Prentiss. Sometime before the destruction of Alderaan, Pol and Cassio attended a party held on the Aldera Royal Palace's Grand Ballroom. During the party, both brothers argued about which of them cheats at greenputt, amusing both Princess Leia Organa and Winter who were hiding underneath a marble staircase to watch the party.
